It opens with a close-up shot of his legs and feet, which are positioned in the center foreground as he jumps. The green court surface with white lines and "YONEX" branding occupies the middle ground, extending from the bottom of the frame. In the background, a blue advertising hoarding with a "RedBull" logo and "China Construction Bank" text spans the width of the frame. As the player jumps upwards, the camera tilts upward, following his movement. This action transitions the view to a medium shot, capturing his upper body and arms mid-jump, still in the center foreground. His badminton racket is also in the foreground. Consequently, the blue hoarding shifts to a lower position in the background, and a dimly lit spectator area becomes visible in the far background above it. The camera is positioned at the subject's level.
